src_original:  71 tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa gṛhe vā layane vā avavarake vā varṣāsahasrasyātyayena  5 na tat kadācit tailapradyotaḥ kṛto bhavet* atha ca tatra kaścid eva puruṣaḥ tailapradīpaṃ kuryāt* tat kiṃ manyase
1 kāśyapa maivaṃ tasya tamondhakārasya bhūd varṣāsahasraṃ saṃcito 'haṃ nāham ito vigamiṣyāmīti /
āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan na hi
2 tasya tamondhakārasya śaktir asti yas tailapradyote kṛte na vigantum avaśyaṃ tena vigatavyaṃ bhagavān āha evam
3 eva kāśyapa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasaṃcito 'pi karmakleśa ekena yoniśomanasīkāraprajñāpratyavekṣaṇena  4 vigacchati /
